endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: top_k

param_schema.title: Top K
param_schema.description: Valid if you choose top_k decoding. The number of highest probability vocabulary tokens to keep for top-k-filtering

parameters.description: Valid if you choose top_k decoding. The number of highest probability vocabulary tokens to keep for top-k-filtering

parameters.name: top_p

param_schema.title: Top P
param_schema.description: Valid if you choose top_p decoding. When decoding text, samples from the top p percentage of most likely tokens; lower to ignore less likely tokens

parameters.description: Valid if you choose top_p decoding. When decoding text, samples from the top p percentage of most likely tokens; lower to ignore less likely tokens

parameters.name: max_length

param_schema.title: Max Length
param_schema.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. A word is generally 2-3 tokens

parameters.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. A word is generally 2-3 tokens

parameters.name: temperature

param_schema.title: Temperature
param_schema.description: Adjusts randomness of outputs, greater than 1 is random and 0 is deterministic, 0.75 is a good starting value.

parameters.description: Adjusts randomness of outputs, greater than 1 is random and 0 is deterministic, 0.75 is a good starting value.

parameters.name: repetition_penalty

param_schema.title: Repetition Penalty
param_schema.description: Penalty for repeated words in generated text; 1 is no penalty, values greater than 1 discourage repetition, less than 1 encourage it.

parameters.description: Penalty for repeated words in generated text; 1 is no penalty, values greater than 1 discourage repetition, less than 1 encourage it.

max_length.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate. A word is generally 2-3 tokens
